title: How CrewAI is evolving beyond orchestration to create the most powerful Agentic AI platform
content: Day 2 of CrewAI Launch Week 01 (May 2025)There are a handful of well-known agent frameworks and platforms, and you know what? They can all demonstrate the value of agents with a simple proof of concept. They all support agent planning, orchestration, memory management and tool use – the
author: Shane Johnson
